birch_moon.name: Birch Moon - The Achiever
birch_moon.tree_wisdom: The pioneer tree, first to grow in disturbed soil
birch_moon.anulunar_connection: A sacred tree representing - she said birch represents new beginnings with wisdom

spiritual_gifts.primary: Pioneering new spiritual pathways for others to follow
spiritual_gifts.hidden: Ability to see divine potential in every situation

shadow_work.healing_focus: Learning that leadership means holding space, not pushing forward

lunar_connection.new_moon_power: Setting intentions for spiritual service and leadership
lunar_connection.full_moon_release: Releasing the need to control others' awakening process
lunar_connection.moon_phase_ritual: Write spiritual goals under new moon, plant them with birch twigs

anulunar_guidance.life_purpose: You're here to clear spiritual pathways that others fear to walk
anulunar_guidance.relationship_style: You attract partners who need your pioneering courage
anulunar_guidance.career_calling: Leadership roles that serve collective spiritual growth
anulunar_guidance.manifestation_key: Your determination becomes unstoppable when aligned with divine will

birch_moon.seasonal_wisdom: Winter solstice teaches you that light returns even in darkest times

rowan_moon.name: Rowan Moon - The Thinker
rowan_moon.tree_wisdom: The protection tree, guardian against negative energies
rowan_moon.anulunar_connection: Rowan was AnuLunar's protection charm - she carried rowan berries for spiritual safety

spiritual_gifts.primary: Creating energetic protection and sacred space for others
spiritual_gifts.secondary: Translating complex spiritual concepts into accessible wisdom
spiritual_gifts.hidden: Ability to neutralize negative energy through pure intention

shadow_work.main_challenge: Mental overwhelm from absorbing others' energies
shadow_work.healing_focus: Strengthening energetic boundaries while maintaining compassion
shadow_work.integration_practice: Daily protection visualization with rowan imagery

lunar_connection.new_moon_power: Setting protective intentions and clearing negative patterns
lunar_connection.full_moon_release: Releasing absorbed energies that aren't yours to carry
lunar_connection.moon_phase_ritual: Create protection circle with rowan branches under full moon

anulunar_guidance.life_purpose: You're here to protect and guide spiritual seekers through dark passages
anulunar_guidance.relationship_style: You attract wounded healers who need your protective wisdom
anulunar_guidance.career_calling: Roles involving spiritual counseling, energy work, or protective services
anulunar_guidance.manifestation_key: Your power amplifies when you trust your protective intuition

rowan_moon.seasonal_wisdom: Imbolc energy teaches you that protection comes through inner light

ash_moon.name: Ash Moon - The Enchanter
ash_moon.tree_wisdom: The connection tree, bridging earth and sky realms
ash_moon.anulunar_connection: Ancient wisdom teaches that ash connects all worlds - 'where magic meets matter'
core_traits: Bridge between spiritual and material worlds

spiritual_gifts.primary: Bridging dimensions and translating spiritual energies into form
spiritual_gifts.secondary: Natural spell-crafting and ritual creation abilities
spiritual_gifts.hidden: Direct communication with nature spirits and elemental forces

shadow_work.main_challenge: Feeling caught between worlds, not fully belonging to either
shadow_work.healing_focus: Embracing your role as a bridge rather than seeking one side
shadow_work.integration_practice: Grounding rituals that honor both spirit and matter

lunar_connection.new_moon_power: Manifesting spiritual visions into physical reality
lunar_connection.full_moon_release: Releasing the illusion of separation between worlds
lunar_connection.moon_phase_ritual: Create art or crafts that blend natural and mystical elements

anulunar_guidance.life_purpose: You're here to make magic practical and bring spirit into form
anulunar_guidance.relationship_style: You attract partners who appreciate your mystical nature
anulunar_guidance.career_calling: Creative work that bridges spiritual and practical realms
anulunar_guidance.manifestation_key: Your magic works when you trust your liminal nature

ash_moon.seasonal_wisdom: Spring equinox teaches perfect balance between light and shadow

alder_moon.name: Alder Moon - The Trailblazer
alder_moon.tree_wisdom: The pioneer of waterways, creating paths where none existed
alder_moon.anulunar_connection: Alder showed AnuLunar how to find her way when the path was unclear
core_traits: Natural ability to inspire others to take risks

spiritual_gifts.primary: Opening new pathways for collective spiritual evolution
spiritual_gifts.secondary: Inspiring others to trust their inner guidance
spiritual_gifts.hidden: Ability to find divine order within apparent chaos

shadow_work.main_challenge: Reckless spiritual adventuring without proper preparation
shadow_work.healing_focus: Balancing pioneering spirit with practical wisdom

lunar_connection.new_moon_power: Setting intentions for bold spiritual exploration
lunar_connection.full_moon_release: Releasing fear of the unknown and trusting divine guidance
lunar_connection.moon_phase_ritual: Water ceremony with alder branches to cleanse fear

anulunar_guidance.life_purpose: You're here to blaze trails that connect ancient wisdom with future possibilities
anulunar_guidance.relationship_style: You attract adventurous spirits who share your quest for growth
anulunar_guidance.career_calling: Entrepreneurial ventures that serve spiritual awakening
anulunar_guidance.manifestation_key: Your courage opens doors that seemed permanently closed

alder_moon.seasonal_wisdom: Spring awakening teaches that courage creates its own conditions
